format: This data frame contains the following columns:
title: Covariates in the Rodriguez and Goldman simulation
description:
Description
The s3bbx data frame has 2449 rows and 6 columns of the
covariates in the simulation by Rodriguez and Goldman of multilevel
dichotomous data.

parameters.commcov: a numeric vector of the community-level covariate
parameters.famcov: a numeric vector of the family-level covariate
parameters.family: a numeric vector identifying the family
parameters.community: a numeric vector identifying the community
parameters.chldcov: a numeric vector of the child-level covariate
parameters.child: a numeric vector identifying the child
